root.name: SD Gundam Neo Battling
root.description: OverviewSD Gundam Neo Battling is a simple vertical-scrolling shooter from Banpresto. The player chooses one of twelve Gundams, each having different stats and a different charge shot, and then attempt to destroy as many enemy Mobile Suits as possible. Along the way, several boxes fall down; these boxes contain items that may either help or hurt the player. Â CharactersRX-78-2 Gundam (Amuro Ray) - 6 Way BeamRX-78NT1 Alex (Christina Mackenzie) - 8 Way BeamGP01-Fb Full Vernian (Kou Uraki) - Special BeamGP03S Stamen (Kou Uraki) - 3 Way BeamRX-178 Gundam Mk.II (Kamille Bidan) - 4 Way HomingMSZ-006 Zeta Gundam (Kamille Bidan) - 5 Way BeamMSZ-010 ZZ Gundam (Judau Ashta) - Wave BeamMSA0011EX EX-S Gundam (Ryu Roots) - 4 Way HomingRX-93 Nu Gundam (Amuro Ray) - Twin HomingF90 Gundam F90 (Def Stallion) - Wide Ring BeamF91 Gundam F91 (Seabook Arno) - Twin BeamRXF91 Silhouette Gundam (Tokio Randall) - Hyper Twin Beam
